#labels Listener,Graph
= Transactions per Second <sup><font color=gray size="1">since 0.3.0</font></sup>=

This graph shows the number of transactions per second for each sampler. It counts for each seconds the number of finished transactions. Compared to the previous version (0.3.0), it will now also display the failed transactions.

<font color='red'>This graph replace now the old 'Total Transactions per Seconds' one. It produces the same output if you use the [#Aggregated_display aggregated mode].</font>
